conditional_rules: IF resource == 'command' AND operation == 'execute' THEN SHOW parameter 'command'
IF resource == 'command' AND operation == 'execute' THEN SHOW parameter 'cwd'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'upload' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'download' THEN SHOW parameter 'path'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation == 'download' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'file' AND operation IN ["upload", "download"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
